meanings.definition: Distinguished by some unusual quality; esteemed particularly; exceptional.
meanings.sent1: She received an especial award for her outstanding performance.
meanings.sent2: The cake was made with especial care for the birthday girl.
meanings.sent3: It was an especial treat to see the fireworks on a weekday.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky with an especial beauty.
meanings.sent5: The teacher had an especial way of making history lessons come alive.

meanings.definition: Of a special or particular kind.
meanings.sent1: He had an especial talent for playing the piano.
meanings.sent2: The shop sold many items of especial interest to collectors.
meanings.sent3: The cat had an especial fondness for sleeping on the windowsill.
meanings.sent4: The garden was filled with an especial variety of colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The old book had an especial charm that drew readers in.
